00039 bool QoccInputOutput::importModel( const QString fileName,
00040                                                                     const FileFormat format,
00041                                                                         const Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext& ic )
00042 {
00043 
00044     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
00045     Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape shapes = importModel( format, fileName );
00046         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00047 
00048     if ( shapes.IsNull() || !shapes->Length() )
00049         {
00050         return false;
00051         }
00052 
00053     for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00054         {
00055                 Handle(AIS_Shape) anAISShape = new AIS_Shape( shapes->Value( i ) );
00056                 ic->SetMaterial( anAISShape, Graphic3d_NOM_GOLD);
00057                 ic->SetColor( anAISShape, Quantity_NOC_RED);
00058                 ic->SetDisplayMode( anAISShape, 1, Standard_False );
00059                 ic->Display(anAISShape, Standard_False);
00060         }
00061     ic->UpdateCurrentViewer();
00062     return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065 Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape QoccInputOutput::importModel( const FileFormat format, const QString& file )
00066 {
00067     Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape shapes;
00068     try {
00069         switch ( format )
00070         {
00071         case FormatBREP:
00072             shapes = importBREP( file );
00073             break;
00074         case FormatIGES:
00075             shapes = importIGES( file );
00076             break;
00077         case FormatSTEP:
00078             shapes = importSTEP( file );
00079             break;
00080         case FormatCSFDB:
00081             shapes = importCSFDB( file );
00082             break;
00083                 default:
00084                         // To Do - Error message here?
00085                         break;
00086         }
00087     } catch ( Standard_Failure ) {
00088         shapes.Nullify();
00089     }
00090     return shapes;
00091 }

00098 bool QoccInputOutput::exportModel( const QString fileName,
00099                                                                     const FileFormat format,
00100                                                                         const Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext& ic )
00101 {
00102 
00103         Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape shapes = getShapes( ic );
00104     if ( shapes.IsNull() || !shapes->Length() )
00105         return false;
00106 
00107     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
00108     bool stat = exportModel( format, fileName, shapes );
00109     QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00110     return stat;
00111 }
00112 
00113 bool QoccInputOutput::exportModel( const FileFormat format, const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00114 {
00115     bool status;
00116     try {
00117         switch ( format )
00118         {
00119         case FormatBREP:
00120             status = exportBREP( file, shapes );
00121             break;
00122         case FormatIGES:
00123             status = exportIGES( file, shapes );
00124             break;
00125         case FormatSTEP:
00126             status = exportSTEP( file, shapes );
00127             break;
00128         case FormatCSFDB:
00129             status = exportCSFDB( file, shapes );
00130             break;
00131         case FormatSTL:
00132             status = exportSTL( file, shapes );
00133             break;
00134         case FormatVRML:
00135             status = exportVRML( file, shapes );
00136             break;
00137         }
00138     } catch ( Standard_Failure ) {
00139         status = false;
00140     }
00141     return status;
00142 }

00144 Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape QoccInputOutput::getShapes( const Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext& ic )
00145 {
00146     Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape aSequence;
00147     Handle_AIS_InteractiveObject picked;
00148     for ( ic->InitCurrent(); ic->MoreCurrent(); ic->NextCurrent() )
00149     {
00150         Handle_AIS_InteractiveObject obj = ic->Current();
00151         if ( obj->IsKind( STANDARD_TYPE( AIS_Shape ) ) )
00152         {
00153             TopoDS_Shape shape = Handle_AIS_Shape::DownCast(obj)->Shape();
00154             if ( aSequence.IsNull() )
00155                 aSequence = new TopTools_HSequenceOfShape();
00156             aSequence->Append( shape );
00157         }
00158     }
00159     return aSequence;
00160 }

00163 Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape QoccInputOutput::importBREP( const QString& file )
00164 {
00165         Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape aSequence;
00166     TopoDS_Shape aShape;
00167         BRep_Builder aBuilder;
00168 
00169         Standard_Boolean result = BRepTools::Read(  aShape, file.toAscii().data(), aBuilder );
00170         if ( result )
00171     {
00172             aSequence = new TopTools_HSequenceOfShape();
00173                 aSequence->Append( aShape );
00174     }
00175 
00176     return aSequence;
00177 }
00178 
00179 Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape QoccInputOutput::importIGES( const QString& file )
00180 {
00181     Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape aSequence;
00182     IGESControl_Reader Reader;
00183     int status = Reader.ReadFile( file.toAscii().data() );
00184 
00185     if ( status == IFSelect_RetDone )
00186     {
00187         aSequence = new TopTools_HSequenceOfShape();
00188         Reader.TransferRoots();
00189         TopoDS_Shape aShape = Reader.OneShape();
00190         aSequence->Append( aShape );
00191     }
00192         return aSequence;
00193 }
00194 
00195 Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape QoccInputOutput::importSTEP( const QString& file )
00196 {
00197         Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape aSequence;
00198 
00199         STEPControl_Reader aReader;
00200         IFSelect_ReturnStatus status = aReader.ReadFile( file.toAscii().data() );
00201         if ( status == IFSelect_RetDone )
00202     {
00203 //#warning changed from Interface_TraceFile
00204             //Messenger_Message::SetDefault();
00205             bool failsonly = false;
00206             aReader.PrintCheckLoad( failsonly, IFSelect_ItemsByEntity );
00207 
00208             int nbr = aReader.NbRootsForTransfer();
00209             aReader.PrintCheckTransfer( failsonly, IFSelect_ItemsByEntity );
00210             for ( Standard_Integer n = 1; n <= nbr; n++ )
00211             {
00212                 bool ok = aReader.TransferRoot( n );
00213                         if (ok)
00214                         {
00215                                 int nbs = aReader.NbShapes();
00216                                 if ( nbs > 0 )
00217                                 {
00218                                         aSequence = new TopTools_HSequenceOfShape();
00219                                         for ( int i = 1; i <= nbs; i++ )
00220                                         {
00221                                                 TopoDS_Shape shape = aReader.Shape( i );
00222                                                 aSequence->Append( shape );
00223                                         }
00224                                 }
00225                         }
00226         }
00227     }
00228         return aSequence;
00229 }

00231 Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape QoccInputOutput::importCSFDB( const QString& file )
00232 {
00233         Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape aSequence;
00234 
00235     // Check file type
00236     if ( FSD_File::IsGoodFileType( file.toAscii().data() ) != Storage_VSOk )
00237             return aSequence;
00238 
00239     static FSD_File fileDriver;
00240     TCollection_AsciiString aName( file.toAscii().data() );
00241     if ( fileDriver.Open( aName, Storage_VSRead ) != Storage_VSOk )
00242         return aSequence;
00243 
00244     Handle(ShapeSchema) schema = new ShapeSchema();
00245     Handle(Storage_Data) data  = schema->Read( fileDriver );
00246     if ( data->ErrorStatus() != Storage_VSOk )
00247         return aSequence;
00248 
00249     fileDriver.Close();
00250 
00251     aSequence = new TopTools_HSequenceOfShape();
00252     Handle(Storage_HSeqOfRoot) roots = data->Roots();
00253     for ( int i = 1; i <= roots->Length() ; i++ )
00254     {
00255         Handle(Storage_Root) r = roots->Value( i );
00256         Handle(Standard_Persistent) p = r->Object();
00257         Handle(PTopoDS_HShape) aPShape = Handle(PTopoDS_HShape)::DownCast(p);
00258         if ( !aPShape.IsNull() )
00259         {
00260                 PTColStd_PersistentTransientMap aMap;
00261                 TopoDS_Shape aTShape;
00262             MgtBRep::Translate( aPShape, aMap, aTShape, MgtBRep_WithTriangle );
00263             aSequence->Append( aTShape );
00264         }
00265     }
00266 
00267     return aSequence;
00268 }

00271 bool QoccInputOutput::exportBREP( const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00272 {
00273     if ( shapes.IsNull() || shapes->IsEmpty() )
00274         return false;
00275 
00276     TopoDS_Shape shape = shapes->Value( 1 );
00277     return BRepTools::Write( shape, file.toAscii().data() );
00278 }

00280 bool QoccInputOutput::exportIGES( const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00281 {
00282     if ( shapes.IsNull() || shapes->IsEmpty() )
00283         return false;
00284 
00285     IGESControl_Controller::Init();
00286         IGESControl_Writer writer( Interface_Static::CVal( "XSTEP.iges.unit" ),
00287                                Interface_Static::IVal( "XSTEP.iges.writebrep.mode" ) );
00288 
00289         for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00290                 writer.AddShape ( shapes->Value( i ) );
00291         writer.ComputeModel();
00292         return writer.Write( file.toAscii().data() );
00293 }
00294 
00295 bool QoccInputOutput::exportSTEP( const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00296 {
00297     if ( shapes.IsNull() || shapes->IsEmpty() )
00298         return false;
00299 
00300     IFSelect_ReturnStatus status;
00301 
00302     STEPControl_Writer writer;
00303         for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00304     {
00305                 status = writer.Transfer( shapes->Value( i ), STEPControl_AsIs );
00306         if ( status != IFSelect_RetDone )
00307             return false;
00308     }
00309 
00310     status = writer.Write( file.toAscii().data() );
00311 
00312     switch ( status )
00313     {
00314     case IFSelect_RetError:
00315         myInfo = tr( "INF_DATA_ERROR" );
00316         break;
00317     case IFSelect_RetFail:
00318         myInfo = tr( "INF_WRITING_ERROR" );
00319         break;
00320     case IFSelect_RetVoid:
00321         myInfo = tr( "INF_NOTHING_ERROR" );
00322         break;
00323         default:
00324                 break;
00325     }
00326     return status == IFSelect_RetDone;
00327 }
00328 
00329 bool QoccInputOutput::exportCSFDB( const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00330 {
00331     if ( shapes.IsNull() || shapes->IsEmpty() )
00332         return false;
00333 
00334     static FSD_File fileDriver;
00335 
00336     Handle(ShapeSchema) schema = new ShapeSchema();
00337     Handle(Storage_Data) data  = new Storage_Data();
00338     data->ClearErrorStatus();
00339 
00340     data->SetApplicationName( TCollection_ExtendedString( "Sample Import / Export" ) );
00341     data->SetApplicationVersion( "1" );
00342     data->SetDataType( TCollection_ExtendedString( "Shapes" ) );
00343     data->AddToUserInfo( "Storing a persistent set of shapes in a flat file" );
00344     data->AddToComments( TCollection_ExtendedString( "Application is based on CasCade 5.0 Professional" ) );
00345 
00346     if ( fileDriver.Open( file.toAscii().data(), Storage_VSWrite ) != Storage_VSOk )
00347     {
00348         myInfo = tr( "INF_TRANSLATE_ERROR_CANTSAVEFILE" ).arg( file );
00349         return false;
00350     }
00351 
00352     PTColStd_TransientPersistentMap aMap;
00353         for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00354         {
00355                 TopoDS_Shape shape = shapes->Value( i );
00356                 if ( shape.IsNull() )
00357                 {
00358                         myInfo = tr( "INF_TRANSLATE_ERROR_INVALIDSHAPE" );
00359                         return false;
00360         }
00361 
00362         Handle(PTopoDS_HShape) pshape = MgtBRep::Translate( shape, aMap, MgtBRep_WithTriangle );
00363                 TCollection_AsciiString objName = TCollection_AsciiString( "Object_" ) + TCollection_AsciiString( i );
00364                 data->AddRoot( objName, pshape );
00365         }
00366 
00367     schema->Write( fileDriver, data );
00368     fileDriver.Close();
00369 
00370     if ( data->ErrorStatus() != Storage_VSOk )
00371     {
00372         myInfo = tr( "INF_TRANSLATE_ERROR_CANTSAVEDATA" );
00373         return false;
00374     }
00375     return true;
00376 }
00377 
00378 bool QoccInputOutput::exportSTL( const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00379 {
00380     if ( shapes.IsNull() || shapes->IsEmpty() )
00381         return false;
00382 
00383         TopoDS_Compound res;
00384         BRep_Builder builder;
00385         builder.MakeCompound( res );
00386 
00387         for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00388         {
00389                 TopoDS_Shape shape = shapes->Value( i );
00390                 if ( shape.IsNull() )
00391                 {
00392                         myInfo = tr( "INF_TRANSLATE_ERROR_INVALIDSHAPE" );
00393                         return false;
00394         }
00395                 builder.Add( res, shape );
00396         }
00397 
00398         StlAPI_Writer writer;
00399         writer.Write( res, file.toAscii().data() );
00400 
00401     return true;
00402 }

00404 bool QoccInputOutput::exportVRML( const QString& file, const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00405 {
00406     if ( shapes.IsNull() || shapes->IsEmpty() )
00407         return false;
00408 
00409         TopoDS_Compound res;
00410         BRep_Builder builder;
00411         builder.MakeCompound( res );
00412 
00413         for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00414         {
00415                 TopoDS_Shape shape = shapes->Value( i );
00416                 if ( shape.IsNull() )
00417                 {
00418                         myInfo = tr( "INF_TRANSLATE_ERROR_INVALIDSHAPE" );
00419                         return false;
00420         }
00421                 builder.Add( res, shape );
00422         }
00423 
00424         VrmlAPI_Writer writer;
00425         writer.Write( res, file.toAscii().data() );
00426 
00427     return true;
00428 }

00430 bool QoccInputOutput::checkFacetedBrep( const Handle_TopTools_HSequenceOfShape& shapes )
00431 {
00432         bool err = false;
00433         for ( int i = 1; i <= shapes->Length(); i++ )
00434         {
00435             TopoDS_Shape shape = shapes->Value( i );
00436         for ( TopExp_Explorer fexp( shape, TopAbs_FACE ); fexp.More() && !err; fexp.Next() )
00437                 {
00438                     Handle(Geom_Surface) surface = BRep_Tool::Surface( TopoDS::Face( fexp.Current() ) );
00439                     if ( !surface->IsKind( STANDARD_TYPE( Geom_Plane ) ) )
00440                         err = true;
00441                 }
00442         for ( TopExp_Explorer eexp( shape, TopAbs_EDGE ); eexp.More() && !err; eexp.Next() )
00443                 {
00444                     Standard_Real fd, ld;
00445                     Handle(Geom_Curve) curve = BRep_Tool::Curve( TopoDS::Edge( eexp.Current() ), fd, ld );
00446                     if ( !curve->IsKind( STANDARD_TYPE( Geom_Line ) ) )
00447                         err = true;
00448                 }
00449         }
00450         return !err;
00451 }
